# environmentBackdrop

**Instance Property**

The environment backdrop associated with the immersive camera view

## Declaration

```swift
var environmentBackdrop: MDLAsset? { get }
```

## Instance Properties

- **cameraID**: The camera identifier string of the Immersive camera associated with this view model.
- **leftEye**: Left eye mesh associated with the immersive camera view.
- **mask**: Generated immersive video mask associated with the immersive camera view
- **rightEye**: Right eye mesh associated with the immersive camera view.
